galacticGovernment.name: United Galactic Council
galacticGovernment.description: The highest governing body of the galaxy, dedicated to maintaining peace and cooperation among all species.

narrativeEvents.title: Galactic Treaty Signing
narrativeEvents.description: A historic event where all major civilizations signed the Galactic Peace Treaty.

narrativeEvents.title: Intergalactic Trade Fair
narrativeEvents.description: An annual event showcasing goods and technology from across the galaxy.

narrativeEvents.title: Xenodiplomacy Symposium
narrativeEvents.description: A conference for ambassadors and diplomats to discuss inter-species relations.

galacticNews.headline: New Interstellar Highway Opens
galacticNews.content: The grand opening of the 'Cosmic Expressway' promises faster travel between star systems.

galacticNews.headline: Research Breakthrough in Wormhole Technology
galacticNews.content: Scientists have made significant strides in making wormhole travel safer and more accessible.

galacticNews.headline: Nomadic Aliens Seek New Home
galacticNews.content: A nomadic alien species known as the 'Vagabonds' is in search of a new habitable planet.
